home.title2: A Web3 Share To Earn GameFi
home.in: 'Legend' is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Korean game company Wemade and represented by Shengqu Games.LEGENDCOIN GameFi is the promotion token of the Legend game.Users can promote Legend to allow more people to participate and earn money at the same time.
home.downloadLink: Game Download Links for Apple and Android
home.note: We will use 60% of all revenue from the game to promote the development of CQBI

stake.addressValidNote: Please enter the correct address or do not enter
stake.claimStakeRewarding: In the process of receiving pledge rewards...
stake.stakeRule3: 3.The pledge time is one year, and can be withdrawn halfway, with a 50% deduction
stake.stakeRule4: 4.First-level and second-level inviters can get 10% and 5% of transaction rewards respectively
stake.noClaimRewardV: There are no rewards to claim
stake.note1: 50% deduction for early termination of pledge

earn.in: Legend is promoting a brand-new financial model to encourage community users to participate in sharing, so that more users can promote the development of the game together. At the same time, users can obtain rich early income while promoting the development of the game!

airdrop.airDrop1: The first round of airdrops: 1:1 exchange for CQB holders, 1 token will be released every day
airdrop.airDrop2: Ordinary airdrop: Users who do not hold CQB can receive ordinary airdrops
